content: Wow! Validating, invigorating, challenging, empowering; just a few things I felt about your article. Idiosyncrasies was mentioned…ya, I’ve been in those moments, related to another or ideas or actions of others I also have taken….looked foolish n ridiculed only to see that labeller n heckler doing exactly what I suggested! Ya, go figure! Anyway, thanks. I’m gonna take this article to a next level of action. I really appreciated the content in it’s entirety.
